rows.THE COORDINATION HEDGEFUND: Thesis → Order → Fulfillment. For complex coordination, not financial instruments.
THE ANALOGY (AND WHY IT'S NOT JUST AN ANALOGY)
Hedge funds solved the gap between thesis and execution for financial markets.
A trader has a view on a stock. The infrastructure to test that view exists:
standardized instruments, clearing systems, position management, risk controls,
continuous feedback. Thesis-to-action gap is near zero.
Business theses have no equivalent infrastructure.
You think 'electrolyte brand for endurance athletes' and you're staring down
6-12 months of hiring, building, testing — all bespoke, all manual.
There is no execution layer for business theses.
The Coordination Hedgefund IS that execution layer.
HEDGE FUND:        Thesis → Order → Fulfillment
COORDINATION HF:   Thesis → Trade → Execution
Thesis = M0 (locked strategic commitment: product, customer, channel, unit economics)
Trade = 698-tab operating model (41 models, expert-validated, AI-navigable)
Execution = labor chain (VA → CoS → PM → experts → VPs → investors → operator)
Submit a thesis. The system generates the organizational structure to execute it.
That's what a trading platform does. That's what this does.
WHY DAOs FAILED AND THIS WON'T
DAOs solved governance. They didn't solve execution.
A DAO can vote on what to do. It can't coordinate the doing.
Token holders can signal preferences. They can't fill 698 tabs.
Smart contracts can transfer value. They can't manage a supply chain.
The missing piece was always: executable documentation.
Documents that define work. Rubrics that auto-grade. Templates that cascade.
Payment that releases on completion. Grading that's transparent.
The Trade IS the executable document. 41 models. Each one defines the work,
the standard, the verification criteria, and the grading methodology.
The CM system provides transparent, immutable grading.
The School Model provides structured execution with defined completion.
Claude provides the interface that makes the complexity navigable.
This is a DAO that can execute, because the execution is encoded in documents
rather than dependent on ad hoc human coordination.
THE TECH ROADMAP
Project
P1: Trade Automation
rows.col_2: AI goes from "generates draft human reviews" to "generates final output that passes expert review without human in loop." Model by model, starting with easiest domains.
rows.col_3: Reduces cost and time per Trade. Today: ~$10K and 16 weeks per Trade. Target: ~$1K and 2 weeks.
rows.col_4: Expert Calibration Logs from IonWave + future spinoffs. Each completed Trade is training data.
rows.col_5: Months 1-12. Progressive. Some models automate by Month 3, all by Month 12.

rows.THE COORDINATION HEDGEFUND: P2: RL Environment
rows.col_2: The Trade has grading (CM), semesters, graduation, kill criteria. That is literally a reward function. Build an RL environment where an agent operates a simulated Trade, gets graded, iterates, learns.
rows.col_3: Moves from "AI fills documents" to "AI makes business decisions." The CEO role itself starts getting automated. Not replacing humans — making their decisions increasingly obvious.
rows.col_4: 5 completed Trades as training data. CM grading history. Semester outcomes. Graduation/kill decisions.
rows.col_5: Months 6-18. Requires P1 first (need automated Trade generation to create enough training environments).

rows.THE COORDINATION HEDGEFUND: P3: Trade Parameterization (The Factory)
rows.col_2: Going from IonWave Trade to [Any Product] Trade. The 41 models need to be parameterized so changing the product category cascades correctly through all dependencies.
rows.col_3: This IS the coordination hedgefund. Submit thesis → system generates complete Trade. The mad libs problem solved at scale.
rows.col_4: Multiple completed Trades across different product categories. Dependency maps. Expert calibration patterns.
rows.col_5: Months 12-24. Requires P1 + P2 (need automation + learning before parameterization works).

rows.THE COORDINATION HEDGEFUND: P1 makes each Trade cheaper. P2 makes each Trade smarter. P3 makes Trades instant.
By Month 24, a thesis submitted to the system generates a complete, validated Trade
with automated expert review, an RL-optimized execution plan, and a ready labor chain.
Thesis → Order → Fulfillment. For businesses, not stocks.
